A Have you ever had a really terrible holiday?
B Yes. The worst trip I ever had was in last year.
B To the mountains on a camping trip.
A How long did it take you to get there?
B It took hours, because the traffic was so bad.
A What was so terrible about the holiday?
B It rained the whole time!
A Why didn't you go to a hotel?
A Do you want to go camping again?
B No. I prefer sleeping in a nice bed!
